name: 古风漫画
text_style_content:
{
  "style_transfer_profile": {
    "style_name": "Digital Clean Cel-Shade (精致赛璐璐平涂)",
    "aesthetic_genre": "2D Anime / Modern Guofeng Illustration",
    "rendering_engine_hint": "Niji / Midjourney V6 --style raw / Stable Diffusion Anime Checkpoints"
  },
  "line_art_characteristics": {
    "quality": "Vector-grade precision (矢量级精度)",
    "texture": "Smooth, non-sketchy, continuous lines",
    "weight": "Thin to Medium (细致线条)",
    "color_logic": "Dark brown or Black outlines (not colored lines)",
    "consistency": "Uniform line confidence, no rough edges"
  },
  "coloring_system": {
    "saturation": "High / Vibrant",
    "brightness": "High key (明亮)",
    "method": "Digital Flat Coloring (数码平涂)",
    "blending": "Minimal painterly blending, distinct color blocks"
  },
  "shading_logic": {
    "technique": "Hybrid Cel-Shading (混合赛璐璐)",
    "shadow_edges": "Hard edges for clothing folds and distinct shapes",
    "gradients": "Soft airbrush gradients used within flat color blocks to suggest volume (body curvature)",
    "highlights": "Soft, diffused highlights on fabric; Band-style highlights on hair (天使光环式高光)",
    "ambient_occlusion": "Low (minimal distinct dark corners)",
    "light_source": "Frontal, soft studio lighting"
  },
  "material_rendering_rules": {
    "fabric": "Smooth, silky appearance without visible fabric grain texture",
    "metal/gold": "Rendered with yellow/orange gradients and high-contrast white distinct specular highlights (2D stylized metal)",
    "skin": "Porcelain-like, almost flat with very subtle blush gradients",
    "patterns": "Line-art based overlays (patterns are drawn, not texture-mapped)"
  },
  "composition_style": {
    "background_treatment": "White / Transparent / Solid Color (Character cutout focus)",
    "depth_of_field": "None (Fully in focus)",
    "dimensionality": "2.5D visual effect (3D forms represented with strict 2D techniques)"
  },
  "ai_generation_tags": {
    "positive_style_prompts": [
      "flat color",
      "cel shading",
      "clean lines",
      "vector art style",
      "high definition",
      "vibrant colors",
      "smooth texture",
      "anime style illustration",
      "digital drawing",
      "crisp contours"
    ],
    "negative_style_prompts": [
      "sketch",
      "loose strokes",
      "oil painting",
      "heavy texture",
      "realistic skin texture",
      "3d render",
      "volumetric lighting",
      "noise",
      "grainy",
      "watercolor"
    ]
  }
}
